quote_last: , a single Bird Unto a silent Sky Propounded but a single term Of cautious melody.
title: At Half past Three, a single Bird
author: Emily Dickinson

quote_last: he lost one illusion: officers sent to reconnoitre informed him that the enemy was making no movement.
title: Les Miserables
author: Victor Hugo

quote_last: in Mrs. Ralph's finally quiet house when Garp decides to clean the kitchen, to kill the time until dawn. Familiar with a housewife's tasks, Garp fills the sink and starts to wash the dishes.
title: The World According to Garp
author: John Irving

quote_first: Let's go to sleep, I say. "Look at what time it is." The clock radio is right there beside the bed. Anyone can see it says
title: Whoever Was Using This Bed
author: Raymond Carver

quote_first: Now, look. I am not going to call Dr. McGrath at
quote_last: in the morning to ask if it's all right for my son to eat worms. That's flat.
title: How to Eat Fried Worms
author: Thomas Rockwell
